definition: to tread on/to trample/to stamp/to fulfill/Taiwan pr. [dao4]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: She can be counted as a dancer.
The singer and the dancer are to attend our English evening at our request.
sentences.chinese: 那位歌唱家和那位舞蹈家将应邀出席我们的英语晚会。

sentences.english: His fiancee is a promising young terpsichorean .
sentences.chinese: 的未婚妻是个有前途的青年舞蹈家。

sentences.english: Pavlova was counted among the greatest dancers of the century.
sentences.chinese: 巴芙洛娃被视为是本世纪最伟大的舞蹈家之一。

sentences.english: It was Li's dream to become a ballet dancer.
sentences.chinese: 李月的理想是当芭蕾舞蹈家，地震让她失去了一条腿。

sentences.english: Yang Liping is know as a great dancer.
sentences.chinese: 杨丽萍是公认的出色的舞蹈家。

sentences.english: The dancer's breathing quickened as she approached the end of her solo.
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈家在接近她独舞的尾声时呼吸变得急速了。

sentences.english: Clubs have dancers and excessive use of smoke machines.
sentences.chinese: 吧啲有好靓舞蹈家同埋太多用烟机。

sentences.english: Why she's a spicy dish: Madhuri is a legendary actress in India, on top of being a trained dancer.
sentences.chinese: 玛杜丽是一位印度传奇影星，更是顶尖的舞蹈家。

sentences.english: She has the natural grace of a born dancer .
sentences.chinese: 她生来具有舞蹈家的优雅风度。

sentences.english: Young lady man is a promising young terpsichorean .
sentences.chinese: 的未婚妻是个有前途的青年舞蹈家。

sentences.english: I believe he has the potential to make a good dancer.
sentences.chinese: 我相信他有可以成为一个舞蹈家的潜能。

sentences.english: At the time, S. worked at a theatre where the dancer was performing a solo piece.
sentences.chinese: 那时S在舞蹈家表演单人舞的剧院工作。

sentences.english: He is famous as a eximious terpsichorean .
sentences.chinese: 他是做为一个杰出的舞蹈家而出名。

sentences.english: The young dancer opened the door of Norman Studio full of doubts and respect.
sentences.chinese: 青年舞蹈家满怀尊敬与疑惑地推开诺曼工作室的大门。

sentences.english: Male dancers and choreographers who marry women are most likely to marry lawyers and judges.
sentences.chinese: 男性舞蹈家最有可能与律师或法官配对。
